name: ecommerce_empire
requirements: Execute ONLY the explicitly requested state modifications. Use exact values as specified: numbers as integers/floats (not strings), strings in quotes. For stats dict, use ONLY the key names from the Variable description - never invent new keys. When setting boolean-like values, use integers (1 for true, 0 for false) unless explicitly told otherwise. Do not add unrequested keys or modify unrequested variables.

turns.query: Just registered 'ShopWave' as my new online store! Starting in the idea phase at level 1. Score at 0, actively working on this. Log 'conceived'. Starting with 0 products and 0 orders.
The website is live! Listed 10 products and getting 100 visitors. Move to launched phase. Level up, add 50 points. Log 'website_live'.
We made our first sale! 1 order placed, $50 in revenue. Level up, add 100 points. Log 'first_sale'.
Marketing campaign is working! Visitors tripled to 300, got 5 more orders (total 6), $250 more in revenue (total $300). Level up, add 75 points. Log 'marketing_started'.
Expanded our product line! Added 20 more products (total 30), 15 more orders (total 21), $750 more revenue (total $1,050). Move to growing phase. Level up, add 150 points. Log 'product_expansion'.
Hired our first employee! Set employees to 1, visitors to 600. Level up, add 100 points. Log 'first_hire'.
Opened our first warehouse! Set warehouses to 1, products to 60, orders to 71, revenue to 3550. Set status to 'scaling'. Double our score! Level up. Log 'warehouse_opened'.
Customer service team formed! Hired 4 more employees (total 5). Customer satisfaction rating is 4.0. Level up, add 200 points. Log 'support_team'.
Mobile app launched! Visitors doubled to 1200, 100 more orders (total 171), $5,000 more revenue (total $8,550), 1000 app downloads. Level up, add 300 points. Log 'app_launched'.
Closed our Series A! $5,000,000 in funding, hired 10 more employees (total 15). Move to funded phase. Level up, add 500 points. Log 'series_a'.
Now shipping to 5 countries! 200 more orders (total 371), $10,000 more revenue (total $18,550). Level up, add 400 points. Log 'international'.
Launched our membership program! 500 members signed up. Orders doubled to 742, added $20,000 revenue (total $38,550). Level up, add 500 points. Log 'membership_launched'.

Second warehouse is open! Now have 2 warehouses, 10 more employees (total 25), 300 more orders (total 1042), $15,000 more revenue (total $53,550). Move to national phase. Double the score! Level up. Log 'second_warehouse'.
We're now a marketplace! 50 sellers have joined, products tripled to 180, 500 more orders (total 1542), $25,000 more revenue (total $78,550). Level up, add 800 points. Log 'marketplace'.
Series B closed! $20,000,000 more funding (total $25,000,000), 20 more employees (total 45). Move to enterprise phase. Level up, add 1000 points. Log 'series_b'.
Logistics network expanded! 3 more warehouses (total 5), operating in 10 more countries (total 15), 1000 more orders (total 2542). Level up, add 800 points. Log 'logistics_expansion'.
AI recommendations are live! Visitors doubled to 2400, orders doubled to 5084, revenue doubled to $157,100, satisfaction up to 4.5. Double the score! Level up. Log 'ai_deployed'.
Preparing for IPO! Hired 50 more employees (total 95), valued at $500,000,000. Move to pre_ipo phase. Level up, add 2000 points. Log 'ipo_prep'.
IPO was a massive success! Rename to 'ShopWave Inc.'. Valuation doubled to $1,000,000,000. Trading under ticker 'SWAV'. Move to public phase. Level up, add 5000 points. Log 'ipo_complete'.

We're the global marketplace leader! Rename to 'ShopWave Inc. [GLOBAL]'. Now in 50 countries, 10,000 sellers, processing 1,000,000 orders. Set status to 'leader', level up, triple our score, and set active to False. Log 'global_leader'.
